directions: Cook onions in butter in large skillet on medium-high heat 15 to 20 minutes or until onions are tender, stirring occasionally. Add dressing; cook on medium heat 10 min. or until onions are caramelized, stirring occasionally. Stir in rosemary. Cool completely.

Heat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Press Perfect Parmesan Pizza Dough onto bottom of 17x11-1/2x3/4-inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Let stand 10 minutes. Top with onions. Bake on bottom oven rack 15 minutes or until crust is golden brown.
Top with cheese; bake 2 to 3 minutes or until melted. Top with arugula and pine nuts.
ingredients: 1/2 cup KRAFT Extra Virgin Olive Oil Aged Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing
2 cups CRACKER BARREL Shredded Swiss Au Gratin Cheese
title: Caramelized Onion and Arugula Pizza
